name: summarize-youtube-video-with-ai
title: Summarize YouTube Videos with AI
description: Summarize any YouTube Video with AI. Choose between Raycast AI or ChatGPT. You have to either be a Raycast Pro Member or have an OpenAI API Key.
author: iKasch

commands.name: summarizeVideo
commands.title: Summarize YouTube Video
commands.description: Use AI to create a summary of any YouTube video.

preferences.name: chosenAi
preferences.title: Choose AI
preferences.description: Choose between Raycast AI, OpenAI ChatGPT or Anthropic Claude.

preferences.name: creativity
preferences.title: Creativity
preferences.description: Choose how creative the AI should be.

preferences.name: openaiApiToken
preferences.title: OpenAI API Key
preferences.description: Your OpenAI API Key. Required if you choose ChatGPT as your AI.

preferences.name: openaiEndpoint
preferences.title: OpenAI Endpoint
preferences.description: Choose a custom OpenAI(-compatible) endpoint to use.

preferences.name: openaiModel
preferences.title: OpenAI Model
preferences.description: Choose the OpenAI model to use. Defaults to `chatgpt-4o-latest`.

preferences.name: anthropicApiToken
preferences.title: Anthropic API Key
preferences.description: Your Anthropic API Key. Required if you choose Anthropic Claude as your AI.

preferences.name: anthropicModel
preferences.title: Anthropic Model
preferences.description: Choose the Anthropic model to use. Defaults to `claude-3-5-sonnet-latest`.

preferences.name: language
preferences.title: Language
preferences.description: Define the language which the AI should use to summarize the video.
